name: Cartoon Strike Demo
detailed_description:
Cartoon Strike Demo


The demo includes:

- 3 maps

- 3 modes

- bots support

- DRM free (you don't need Steam client)

You can play this demo until we release the final version of the game. The expected release is at the end of this year. Have fun!

Cartoon Strike Early Access on Steam

In the multiplayer game Cartoon Strike, each map is inspired by a popular game. The players can enjoy a few minutes of fighting in the WWII, followed by a few minutes in the past or future. Aside from the default game modes, players can experience the well-known Battle Royale mode.

The release date of game is Q4 2019, but you can already add game to Wishlist on Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/616830/Cartoon_Strike/

short_description: Demo version of Cartoon Strike. "All Games in One". In Cartoon Strike, each map is inspired by a popular game. Players can enjoy a few minutes of fighting in the WWII, followed by a few minutes in the present, future or even Middle Ages. Aside from the default game modes, players can experience the well-known Battle Royale mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
